resources.string: You already have an account? Log in
You don\'t have an account yet? Sign up

Do you want to play tennis with your friends 
 and you are looking for a tennis court? 
Great choice, log in or register now, book a court 
and enjoy playing together on a professional tennis surface.
As a active club member you have a ***15% discount*** on reservation\n*A active club member is a person hwo pay regular membership fee\n Monthly membership fee is 30 PLN
